page.title: 05A day in my life (2)
page.content: When the bell goes we go into class and get our maths books out and we do maths till twelve o'clock then we have play for half an hour.When the bell goes we start walking down to the canteen for dinners.When we come up we have a short play then we go in for work(we usually have needle work)but in the summer we go outside.At last lesson Sir gives us different work every Friday so we do that .When bell goes we put up our chairs,say our prayers and then we go home.At home I watch T.V for a bit then I put on my riding clothes and go riding for about an hour.Then I have my supper and watch a bit more television.Then I go to bed at half past eight.
